MainPage.title: Effective application for working with APIs
MainPage.description: Restful Client provides an interface for working with API, which includes the ability to create, modify parameters and execute requests. With a strong focus on simplicity and usability, our application supports various HTTP methods. You can easily save and manage your request history while ensuring security through authentication.
MainPage.teamDescription: We are a team of developers, who strive to create functional and user-friendly applications. With our diverse backgrounds and experience, we approach problems in a creative way and collaborate effectively to deliver the best solutions for our users.
MainPage.imageAlt: An image of a computer desktop with 'REST' written on the screen. The computer is surrounded by various icons, folders, and networks.
MainPage.schoolDescription: The Rolling Scopes is an independent international community of developers, founded in 2013. Anyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, employment, or location. Developers from various companies and countries contribute to the training.Â At RS School the principle of PAY IT FORWARD works. RS School shares knowledge with students for free now, hoping that in the future they will return as mentors and pass on their knowledge to the next generation of students in the same way.
